title: Offer Evaluation: Amazon|SDE2| 4YOE
content:
Education: B.Tech Tier 1
Years of Experience: 4
Prior Experience: Product based company
Current TC: 57LPA
Date of the Offer: October 2024
Company: Amazon
Title/Level: SDE 2 (L5)
Location: Banglore
Salary: 4500000 INR (Base)
Relocation/Signing Bonus:1500000 INR(First year) + 1400000(second year)
Stock bonus: 230 units
Bonus:NIL
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock):65LPA


Is it worth moving to Amazon with this small increase of 8LPA per annum. Learning and compensation growth are my major criteria. Current work in my team is mediocre and I feel I am not growing here.

title: Offer Evaluation: Amazon | SDE 2 | 4 YOE
content:
Education: B.Tech from Tier 1
Years of Experience: 4.5
Current Company : FAANG
Date of the Offer: September 2024
Company: Amazon
Title/Level: SDE 2 (L5)
Current TC: 57LPA
Location: India
Salary: 45L Base
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 18L first year + 13L second year
Stock bonus: 230 units 
Bonus:NIL
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): First year - 65L

Is it worth the move to Aamzon India with this much increment?

The work in my team is very mediocre and I feel Im not growing here. Growth interms of personal skills and compensation are my top priority for the switch. Also, I am trying to move to a firm that supports international transfers as well.

title: Salesforce AMTS 2024 Grad
content:
Years of Experience: 10 weeks summer Internship at an MNC
Education: Tier 1 college (top IIT CS)
Date of the Offer: May 2024
Company: Salesforce
Title/Level: AMTS
Location: Hyderabad
Base Salary: 18 L 
Signing Bonus: 4 L
Stock bonus: 25k$RSU for 4 years
Relocation: 50K
Bonus: 10% 
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 18+4+5+1.8+0.5 = 29.3 LPA for 1st year
Benefits: Standard Salesforce benfits

Competing Offers : 29L CTC at an MNC (around 20L in first year)

I consider applying for other companies as the work here is slow and boring but I'm not sure which companies to apply for. Any suggestions?
yoe: 10 Weeks Summer Internship At An Mnc
